description: From Middle English stoutely, stouteliche, stoutliche, equivalent to stout +‎ -ly.

adverbs.description: stoutly (comparative more stoutly, superlative most stoutly)

entries.meaning: In a stout manner; lustily; boldly; obstinately.

examples: He was a stoutly-built and thickly-set man, about the average height, with all the ordinary symptoms of paralysis  […]
